question: Pooja Gehlot has won India's 2nd silver in Under-23 World Wrestling Championships in which category?
explanation: Pooja Gehlot (53kg) has won India\'s 2nd silver at the 2019 U-23 World Wrestling Championships in Budapest, Hungary. In the final, she defeated by Japan\'s Haruna Okuno by Â in the finals of championships. India\'s first silver was won by Ravinder (61kg).
